SQL_Server_Auth_EntraIDIntegrated.explanation: The server should be integrated with Azure Active Directory for authentication and authorization. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/authentication-aad-configure?view=azuresql&tabs=azure-powershell

SQL_Server_Security_Auditing.explanation: The server should have auditing enabled. For more information:  https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/auditing-setup?view=azuresql

SQL_Server_Security_TLS1.2.explanation: The server should have TLS 1.2 enabled. For more information:  https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/connectivity-settings?view=azuresql&tabs=azure-portal#minimal-tls-version

SQL_Server_Security_NetworkAccess.explanation: The server should have public network access disabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/connectivity-settings?view=azuresql&tabs=azure-portal

SQL_Server_Security_OutboundNetworkAcces.explanation: The server should have restrictions on outbound network access disabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/sql-server/install/configure-the-windows-firewall-to-allow-sql-server-access?view=sql-server-ver16

SQL_Server_Security_PrivateEndpointConne.explanation: The server should have private endpoint connections enabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/private-endpoint-overview?view=azuresql

SQL_Server_Security_MaxFirewallRules.explanation: The server should have no more than 10 firewall rules enabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/firewall-configure?view=azuresql

SQL_Server_Security_MaxFirewallIPRange.explanation: The server should have a firewall IP range set, no more than 10 IPs. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/firewall-configure?view=azuresql
